objects.text:
✦ 925 Sterling Silver
✦ Rose Gold Finish
✦ Pink Drop Wreath Design
✦ Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design features a soft and elegant theme, ideal for promoting jewelry products. It uses a gradient background blending from a light blush pink to soft cream, overlaid with subtle dot and geometric accents at low opacity for added texture (referenced in the `background`). The main headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) is bold and uppercase in a deep burgundy hue, creating visual impact. A serif subheading (`subheading`) introduces the product style in a contrasting yet complementary rose tone. The product details (`description`) are listed using icon-style bullets for a clean layout. A tagline (`tagline`) in italic serif font adds an emotional appeal. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large font. A mauve rounded button (`cta_background` with text `cta`) provides a clear call-to-action. The visual is completed with a tilted image of the earrings (`product_image`) placed over the right half of the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#fff5f6`
- Blush: `#f8e1e6`
- Rose Pink: `#f5c0c9`
- Deep Rose: `#c24a6b`
- Burgundy: `#8b1f41`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a beautifully blended color palette consisting of soft rose gold, blush pink, and sparkling crystal white. The rose gold (#EFA8A3) forms the delicate base and outlines the floral motifs, providing a warm and luxurious tone. Blush pink (#F7CAC9) fills the petal-shaped elements, offering a soft, feminine touch. The crystals use a radiant white (#FFFFFF) and diamond-clear (#E1E1E1) hue, which enhances the sparkle and contrasts pleasingly with the metallic rose tones. These colors are harmoniously blended, yet each element is distinctly highlighted through reflective surfaces and precise placement for a vibrant, delicate appearance.
